name: nrl-consumer-api
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.publish: ./node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli generate -i specification/record-locator/consumer.yaml --generator-key v3.0  -g openapi -o build && rm openapitools.json && mv build/openapi.json build/nrl-consumer-api.json

author: NHS Digital
